title: 1.AP.1
text: The student will apply computational thinking by sorting items into categories based on multiple attributes and create patterns.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Describe attributes of a set of objects.
List the attributes a set of objects have in common.
Sort and classify concrete objects based on multiple attributes.

title: 1.AP.2
text: The student will plan and implement algorithms that include the use of sequence and an event based on a predetermined task.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Plan and create a design document that illustrates thoughts, ideas, and stories in a sequential manner.
Construct step-by-step instructions that include decision-making and repetition.
Identify and explain the role of events that are used in an algorithm.
Test algorithms that are sequential and contain an event.

title: 1.AP.3
text: The student will use the iterative design process to construct, test, and debug algorithms that include sequencing and an event.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Discuss and describe the concept of debugging.
Analyze and explain the results of an algorithm.
Revise and improve an algorithm to produce desired outcomes.
